name: Squatch Watch
description:
Squatch Watch is a PS1-style stealth game about keeping the legend of Bigfoot alive. It was created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 competition. 

Post Jam Bug Fix: 

  • Fixed WebGL build to actually work! 
  • Fixed AI's chase range
  • Fixed being able to move after you die
  • Fixed flashlights not showing up on WebGL build
  • Fixed music looping over itself after you beat game

Controls:

Mouse and Keyboard:

Movement - WSAD

Run - Left Shift

Attack - Left Mouse Button

Controller:

Movement - Left Thumbstick

Run - Left Face Button (X)

Attack - Bottom Face Button (A)

To make your mark on the forest, find a puddle of mud and leave your footprint, then escape without being caught! You will encounter 3 types of foes:

Rangers: Park rangers on patrol that will stun you up close on sight


Hunters: Crazed Bigfoot hunters that wander until they catch sight of your trail


FBI: Federal Bigfoot Investigators that will try to gun you down!

AI/Game Programming: Camden Obertop @camden_grape (twitter)
Graphics/Level Design/Game Programming: Jaden Goter @jadengoter (twitter)
Music/Sound: Grant Davis @GrantimationEDM (twitter)
3D Modeling: Matt Lowe @Matlowe100 (twitter)
Animation: Erik Skoog @euskoog (twitter)

Narrator voiced by Camden Obertop. Letter voiced by Denny Nguyen. In-game character voices by Grant Davis.
